amendment.description: Amendment prohibits campaign contributions from individuals who are not citizens or nationals of the United States.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 4 printed in H.Rept. 106-311 to clarify that contributions from any individual other than United States citizens or nationals are prohibited.

action.text: Bereuter amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment is inserted after line 6 on page 55 of the bill.
On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 181 (Roll no. 414).
